ygData.subject: Kunark Masks (was: Timorous Deep Question)
ygData.msgSnippet: What I understand about Harbinger Dronik is that he s on the same spawn point as the hunters and foragers.  They re placeholders for eachother depending on who
ygData.messageBody:
What I understand about Harbinger Dronik is that he's on the same spawn
point as the hunters and foragers. They're placeholders for eachother
depending on who you're hunting. *smirk* I believe other named spawns
are in that same set too. All hearsay tho as I've never done it
myself, just watched key hunts from over a shoulder. More word of
mouth is the Mask of Obtenebration (erudite mask) is from Howling
Stones off of Venril Sathir's counterpart there, the one you lose
faction with. I've seen one in action once and may I say, I think
erudites (females at least) look damn goofy in full lambent.

Ninev Rudeflute
35th, yes.. still 35th a month later
E'ci
